app.title: Privacy Protector Quiz
app.description: Learn how to keep your personal information safe online! Take our fun quiz and become a privacy superhero!

homepage.learningDescription: This quiz will teach you important skills to stay safe online

passwordSafety.title: Password Safety
passwordSafety.description: Learn how to create strong passwords and keep them secret

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.description: Understand what information to keep private

safeWebsites.title: Safe Websites
safeWebsites.description: Recognize trustworthy websites and avoid dangerous ones

smartSharing.title: Smart Sharing
smartSharing.description: Know when and how to share information safely

quizInfo.explanation: Each question teaches you something new about staying safe online. You'll get helpful explanations for every answer!

footer.madeBy: Made with love by Kethan Vegunta, Ekansh Samanta, Ben Archbold

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.description: Never share your real name, address, or phone number with strangers online

strongPasswords.title: Strong Passwords
strongPasswords.description: Use long passwords with letters, numbers, and symbols

suspiciousWebsites.title: Suspicious Websites
suspiciousWebsites.description: Always ask an adult before entering payment information

onlineStrangers.title: Online Strangers
onlineStrangers.description: Never meet people from the internet in real life

encouragement.title: üåü Remember: You're a Privacy Protector! üåü
encouragement.description: Share what you learned with your friends and family to help keep everyone safe online!

superhero.title: Privacy Superhero!
superhero.message: Amazing! You know how to stay super safe online!

pro.title: Privacy Pro!
pro.message: Great job! You understand most online safety rules!

learning.title: Learning Well!
learning.message: Good work! Keep practicing to become even safer online!

keepLearning.title: Keep Learning!
keepLearning.message: You're on the right track! Practice makes perfect!
